about_the_game:
This is a simulation business game.
Purchase items such as lottery tickets, scratch - off tickets, and beverages in the store, and sell these items to cat customers to earn enough principal.
Buy lottery tickets and wait for the lottery draw at the end of each day.
Scratch scratch - off tickets and open beverage bottle caps to win corresponding bonuses.
Invest in stocks and place bets on guesses, where risks and rewards coexist.
Change the store decoration, upgrade equipment, and strive to attract more cats.
However, this world may not be that simple.
detailed_description:
This is a simulation business game.
Purchase items such as lottery tickets, scratch - off tickets, and beverages in the store, and sell these items to cat customers to earn enough principal.
Buy lottery tickets and wait for the lottery draw at the end of each day.
Scratch scratch - off tickets and open beverage bottle caps to win corresponding bonuses.
Invest in stocks and place bets on guesses, where risks and rewards coexist.
Change the store decoration, upgrade equipment, and strive to attract more cats.
However, this world may not be that simple.
name: Cat Lottery Shop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: The cat has owned a lottery store. Now it can buy lottery tickets to its heart's content. Anyway, it wants to get rich! It dreams of getting rich overnight! But is it really going to be that simple? (^=◕ᴥ◕=^)
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, French*, German*, Russian*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
